message.content:
cs.PL, cs.DC, cs.LO, cs.SE, cs.DS

The paper discusses the use of program logics for formal verification of safety properties for concurrent objects and their client programs. This falls under the area of programming languages (cs.PL) and distributed, parallel, and cluster computing (cs.DC). The paper also deals with the specification and verification of correctness conditions for concurrent objects, which is related to logic in computer science (cs.LO) and software engineering (cs.SE). Finally, the paper includes case studies of concurrent objects, which can be considered as data structures (cs.DS).
